content: Hi all - quick question. Is there a way to not have to click on the reply button each time? For example, when I click on a stream & topic, I'd like to start typing instead of hitting reply
@nick just click on a message or hit "enter" to start a reply.
thanks, just a bit annoying to do it everytime :)
@Tim Abbott any way to remove topics all together/disable them?

Nope. It's a bit of extra work when you're sending messages, but users spend a lot more time reading stream messages than writing them, and topics make the reading experience dramatically more efficient.
@nick r will also do it, if that key is closer to you than Enter (it is for me)
